name: GitHub Actions: Env Deploy Gates
description: Deploy to staging automatically and require approval for production.

files.template:
name: Deploy

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  deploy-staging:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment: staging
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - run: echo 'Deploying to staging...'
  deploy-production:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: deploy-staging
    environment: production
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - run: echo 'Deploying to production...'
